title: "Moscow Metro launches Face Pay payment by face recognition"
excerpt: "Face Pay, a fare payment system using face recognition, has been launched on all 14 lines and 241 stations of the Moscow metro. Turnstiles equipped with Face Pay are identified by a round, black sticker on the floor."
